briefdescription.para: Maximum value of the floating-potint vector.
Maximum value of the q15 vector.
Maximum value of the q31 vector.
Maximum value of the q7 vector.
Max value of the u8 vector.
Minimum value of the floating-potint vector.
Minimum value of the q15 vector.
Minimum value of the q31 vector.
Minimum value of the q7 vector.
Minimum value of the u8 vector.
Mean value of the floating-potint vector.
Mean value of the q15 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.15 format input is accumulated in a 32-bit accumulator in 17.15 format and then truncated to yield a result of 1.15 format.

briefdescription.para: Mean value of the q31 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.31 format input is accumulated in a 64-bit accumulator in 33.31 format and then truncated to yield a result of 1.31 format.

briefdescription.para: Mean value of the q7 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.7 format input is accumulated in a 32-bit accumulator in 25.7 format and then truncated to yield a result of 1.7 format.

briefdescription.para: Mean value of the u8 vector.

detaileddescription.para:
*src
points to the input vector.
size
size of the vectors.
mean value.
The 8-bit format input is accumulated in a 32-bit accumulator and then truncated to yield a result of 8-bit format.

briefdescription.para: Sum of the squares of the floating-potint vector.
Sum of the squares of the q15 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.15 format input is multiplied yields a 2.30 format, and then added without saturation to a 64-bit accumulator in 34.30 format. Finally, the return result is in 34.30 format.

briefdescription.para: Sum of the squares of the q31 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.31 format input is multiplied yields a 2.62 format and this result is truncated to 2.48 format by discarding the lower 14 bits. The 2.48 result is then added without saturation to a 64-bit accumulator in 16.48 format. Finally, the return result is in 16.48 format.

briefdescription.para: Sum of the squares of the q7 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.7 format input is multiplied yields a 2.14 format, and then added without saturation to a 32-bit accumulator in 18.14 format. Finally, the return result is in 18.14 format.

briefdescription.para: RMS of the floating-potint vector.
RMS of the q15 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.15 format input is multiplied yields a 2.30 format, and then added without saturation to a 64-bit accumulator in 34.30 format. Finally, the added output is truncated to 34.15 format by discarding the lower 15 bits, and then saturated to yield a result in 1.15 format.

briefdescription.para: RMS of the q31 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.31 format input is multiplied yields a 2.62 format. In order to avoid overflows, the input signal must be scaled down by log2(size) bits, Finally, the 2.62 accumulator is right shifted by 31 bits to yield a 1.31 format value.

briefdescription.para: Standard deviation of the floating-potint vector.
Standard deviation of the q15 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.15 format input is multiplied yields a 2.30 format, and then added without saturation to a 64-bit accumulator in 34.30 format. Finally, the added output is truncated to 34.15 format by discarding the lower 15 bits, and then saturated to yield a result in 1.15 format.

briefdescription.para: Standard deviation of the q31 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.31 format input is multiplied yields a 2.62 format. In order to avoid overflows, the input signal must be scaled down by log2(size) bits, Finally, the 2.62 accumulator is right shifted by 31 bits to yield a 1.31 format value.

briefdescription.para: Standard deviation of the u8 vector.

detaileddescription.para:
*src
points to the input vector.
size
size of the vectors.
Standard deviation value.
Function notes: The 8-bit format input is multiplied yields a 16-bit format, and then added saturation to a 32-bit accumulator in 16.16 format. Finally, the added output is truncated to 34.15 format by discarding the lower 1 bits, and then saturated to yield a result in 1.15 format.

briefdescription.para: Variance of the floating-potint vector.
Variance of the q15 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.15 format input is multiplied yields a 2.30 format, and then added without saturation to a 64-bit accumulator in 34.30 format. Finally, the added output is truncated to 34.15 format by discarding the lower 15 bits, and then saturated to yield a result in 1.15 format.

briefdescription.para: Variance of the q31 vector.

detaileddescription.para: The 1.31 format input is multiplied yields a 2.62 format. In order to avoid overflows, the input signal must be scaled down by log2(size) bits, Finally, the 2.62 accumulator is right shifted by 31 bits to yield a 1.31 format value.

briefdescription.para: Entropy of the floating-potint vector.

detaileddescription.para:
*src
points to the input vector.
size
size of the vectors.
Entropy value.
E = -sum (P .* log2 (P))

briefdescription.para: Relative Entropy of the floating-potint vector.

detaileddescription.para:
*src1
points to the first input vector.
*src2
points to the second input vector.
size
size of the vectors.
Relative Entropy value.
Relative Entropy also called KullbackLeibler divergence: D(A || B) = A * ln(A / B);

briefdescription.para: Log-Sum-Exp of the floating-potint vector.

memberdef.argsstring: (const float32_t *src1, const float32_t *src2, uint32_t size, float32_t *buffer)
memberdef.name: hpm_dsp_lse_dprod_f32

briefdescription.para: Dot product with Log-Sum-Exp of the floating-potint vector.

parameterdescription.para: points to the first input vector.
points to the second input vector.

simplesect.para: the Log-Sum-Exp of dot product value.

briefdescription.para: Naive Gaussian Bayesian Estimator.

parameterdescription.para: points to a naive bayes instance
points to the elements of the input vector.
points to a buffer of length numofclass /numberOfClasses

parameterdescription.para: number of elements in a vector
